::Spears:;

She smiled at Striker,"I'll be OK."  She looked and saw her back and 
quill sindged a bit.  "How are you? Are you OK?" looking at Striker 
with concern on her face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> The initial flame singes Striker, the Maximal flying out of the 
flames. His 
> eyes widen as he sees Savage scorch the valley, looking down at it 
from the 
> cliff as the attacker flies off.
> 
> He sighs, firing a few parting shots at Savage and flying down 
toward Spears. 
> He hears Bluestreak, nodding in agreement as he lands near Spears.
> 
> "Are you allright?" he asks her, glancing at the burning valley 
below.
